column4: Is it possible to upgrade software in ubuntu.  What I mean by this is - Firefox, thunderbird, gaim, all use OLD 1.0.4 releases when like 5.0 is available in each of them because they are the "ubuntu releases"
thrice`; so again - is there some way to upgade say gaim, which is currently running 1.1.4ubuntu to 1.5.0 ?
